summary: This module bundles command‑line utilities for training and running inference with the Imagen multi‑stage text‑to‑image diffusion model. It leverages NeMo, Hydra configuration, and PyTorch Lightning to orchestrate the base 64×64 diffusion model and subsequent super‑resolution stages (256×256, 1024×1024). The scripts handle checkpoint loading, text encoder setup, sampler configuration, and image output, and include a helper for generating image sets for FID evaluation.
business_intent: Provide researchers and product teams with an end‑to‑end pipeline to train, fine‑tune, and generate photorealistic images from textual prompts, accelerating development of generative AI applications and enabling quantitative quality assessment.
